page.title: 18Jobs.
page.content: Farming is one of the jobs in our D-Block. Farmers employ people to help them with many tasks, such as looking after the animals,sowing and harvesting. In the summer people often work as pickers on the farms. They are paid piece rate which means they are paid for the amount they have picked. In Ulcombe there is a paper label factory. They donate old barrels of unwanted sticky labels for the annual school bonfire. Many people who live round here work in offices in Maidstone, or even travel to London by car or train. The village shops employ people as assistants and of course there are also the people who work in all the schools in the area.
